koti ganan kudu kantenar reguwen eliyata tharupiyal koti siya ganan watina koken wani mathkudu kantenar regu dalata hasu nowi pitawanne kese dayi waha soya balana lesa rajayata 27wanidata nuwarata enna eekabaddhaye manthrin thathiranathmaka wishesha sakachchawak sandaha eekabaddha wipakshaya niyojanaya karana parlimenthu manthriwarun 51 denama me masa 27 wanida aagamana wigamana hitapu palakata laksha 66ka dadayak: wasara thaaagamana wigamana departhamenthuwe hitapu palakawarayaku wana jayasinha aarachchige aariyasena mahathata wasara 10kata athhitawu wasara 2ka sira danduwamak ratama gini gaththa '80 juli warjanaya asin dutu me rate wada karana panthiyatath, wruththiya samithi wyaparayatath juli masaya amathaka wanne natha.
